NEWSLETTER.HEADLINE: Newsletter
NEWSLETTER.MSG: Subscribe to our Newsletter. We will only use it for important stuff, we promise not to be too annoying :)

SOCIAL.HEADLINE: Social networks
SOCIAL.MSG: Follow us if you want to be updated with our latest news!

OPEN_SOURCE.HEADLINE: GitHub
OPEN_SOURCE.MSG: We are Open Source! We publish our source code in GitHub, where you can have a look at our different projects and follow what we do.
